entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Mike_Pence @VP Where are the tests?  What is the federal action plan to stop the spread of coronavirus? Why are we opening up the country if the virus is now in the White House?  If your own staff is infected why aren’t you wearing a mask?  Why do you and Trump lie to America every day?  Shame.
